Description:
Detects unusual parent or children of the wab.exe (Windows Contacts) and Wabmig.exe (Microsoft Address Book Import Tool) processes as seen being used with bumblebee activity

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Wab/Wabmig Unusual Parent Or Child Processes
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((parent_process_path like '%\wab.exe' or parent_process_path like '%\wabmig.exe') or ((parent_process_path like '%\wmiprvse.exe' or parent_process_path like '%\svchost.exe' or parent_process_path like '%\dllhost.exe') and (process_path like '%\wab.exe' or process_path like '%\wabmig.exe')))
